abstract: In all of Stefano Pilati's collections for Yves Saint Laurent there are characters who, in ruffles and Belle de Jour uptightness, come close to representing the YSL woman.
snippet: In all of Stefano Pilati's collections for Yves Saint Laurent there are characters who, in ruffles and Belle de Jour uptightness, come close to representing the YSL woman.
lead_paragraph: In all of Stefano Pilati's collections for Yves Saint Laurent there are characters who, in ruffles and Belle de Jour uptightness, come close to representing the YSL woman, yet never quite nail her. Mr. Pilati has done some interesting collections, one or two genuinely weird ones, and some that qualified as modern. That's not such a bad track record in seven years, but unfortunately Mr. Pilati is stuck with a label that in public perception is somewhere between a tasty bonbon and a hallowed shrine.

headline.main: Yves Saint Laurent: Being a Spectator
